Body:
"""Plot the materials in the geometry."""
self.figures.append(plot_materials(self.input_set.geometry, gridsize=100,
    offset=0.1, get_figure=True))
self.figures.append(plot_materials(self.input_set.geometry, gridsize=100,
    offset=0.1, get_figure=True))
self.figures.append(plot_materials(self.input_set.geometry, gridsize=100,
    offset=0.1, get_figure=True, xlim=(0.0, 2.0), ylim=(0.0, 2.0)))
self.figures.append(plot_materials(self.input_set.geometry, gridsize=100,
    offset=0.1, get_figure=True, library='pil'))
self.figures.append(plot_materials(self.input_set.geometry, gridsize=100,
    plane='yz', offset=0.6, get_figure=True))
self.figures.append(plot_materials(self.input_set.geometry, gridsize=100,
    plane='xz', offset=0.6, get_figure=True))
